name: Fusion Food
description:
"I" is a chef.
However, it has only been about two days since I started cooking.
It's okay. The beginning is half the battle.
Anyway, "I", who started as a chef, wanted to raise my awareness, so I participated in a cooking contest.
The theme of the competition was "traditional food from different countries or fusion dishes using meals that are usually eaten."
I, who usually liked Finland and Korea, decided to make fusion dishes between Finland and Korea!
I'm going to raise awareness by winning the FIN-KOR's Perfect Fusion Cooking Contest!

Hwang Inyeong - Hwang Inyeong - ChungKang#8634
